From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron's eyes narrowed, as he put his arm in the way, to deflect the
shots. They ripped up his wrist, but he would deal with that later. He
wouldnt let this robot blind him with rage. "Die." Megatron yelled, as
he pointed his fusion cannon up again, aiming straight under Unitron, at
his booster, as he fired another stream of fusion energy, the recoil
pushed him back a little bit.
